file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-26-03-04 - MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIR DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the main-door stair light. B. The main-door stair light is installed on the main door lining, zone 811. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FOR AIRCRAFT WITH MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT ASSEMBLY - 33-26-03-000-801-A AIRSTAIR DOOR REMOVAL FOR AIRCRAFT WITH MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT ASSEMBLY - 33-26-03-400-801-A AIRSTAIR DOOR INSTALLATION FOR AIRCRAFT WITH MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT LENS - RE- REMOVABLE STAIR 33-26-03-000-802-A MOVAL LIGHT LENS FOR AIRCRAFT WITH MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT LENS - IN- REMOVABLE STAIR 33-26-03-400-802-A STALLATION LIGHT LENS EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-26-03 Page 1 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIR DOOR 2. MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the main-door stair light assemblies. (2) The three upper stair light assemblies are interconnected by the same wire. Thus to remove one assembly, it is necessary to remove all of them. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-45-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 811GW Main door 811 811HW Main door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open these circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them: (a) On the circuit breaker panel: – Courtesy Light 1 (Location tip: HOT BUS 2/COURTESY LIGHT 1); – Courtesy 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/LIGHTS/COURTESY 2). (b) On the left power control and distribution box: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-26-03 Page 2 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • Courtesy 3, (Location tip: RB SERV BUS/COURTESY 3). (2) To get access to the three upper stair light assemblies, remove access panel 811GW ( AMM MPP 06-45-00/100). (3) To get access to the lower stair light assembly, remove access panel 811HW ( AMM MPP 06-45-00/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Do these items to remove the stair light assemblies. The three upper stair light assemblies are interconnected by the same wire. Thus to remove one assembly, it is necessary to remove all of them. The lower assembly can be removed separately. (a) Remove and discard the tiedown straps (5) which attach the cable. (b) Disconnect the electrical connection (1). (c) To remove the stair lights with lens removable, do these steps: 1 Remove the sealant from around the lens (3). 2 Remove the two screws (2) which attach the lens (3) to the stair light case (4) and to the stair panel. 3 Remove the lens (3). (d) To remove the stair lights with lens fixed, do these steps: 1 Remove the sealant from around the stair light case (4). 2 Remove the two screws (2) which attach the stair light case (4) to the stair panel. (e) Pull the stair light case (4), turn it perpendicularly to its housing opening, and put it again into the housing in this position. Thus, the stair light case can be removed from the back side of the stairstep. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-26-03 Page 3 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIR DOOR Main-door Stair Light Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 C C C B A ZONE 811 E DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL DET. B CONNECTION D 1 2. SCREWS (2) 4. STAIR LIGHT 3. LENS CASE DET. C STAIR LIGHT 1 CASE E DET. D D 2. SCREWS (2) 5. TIE-DOWN STRAP DET. E 2 4. STAIR LIGHT CASE DET. C STAIR LIGHT 2 CASE DET. D 1 STAIR LIGHT WITH LENS REMOVABLE. 2 STAIR LIGHT WITH LENS FIXED. EM145AMM330286A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-26-03 Page 4 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIR DOOR 3. MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the main-door stair light assembly. (2) The three upper stair light assembly are interconnected by the same wire. Thus, the three assemblies must be installed at the same time. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-45-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 33-26-00-700-801-A/500 COURTESY/STAIR LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST MIL-S-23190 - SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 811GW Main door 811 811HW Main door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) Specification TT-S-00230 TYPE II Sealant RTV 780 (white) AR G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Tiedown strap MIL-S-23190 AR H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-26-03 Page 5 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Do these items to install the stair light assemblies. The three upper stair light assembly are interconnected by the same wire. Thus, the three assemblies must be installed at the same time. (a) From behind, perpendicularly pass the stair light case (4) through its housing opening and on the other side, turn it to its installation position. (b) To install the stair lights with lens removable, do these steps: 1 Put the lens (3) in its installation position. 2 Tighten the two screw (2) that attach the lens to the stair light case (4) and to the stair panel. (c) To install the stair lights with lens fixed, do this step: 1 Tighten the two screw (2) that attach the stair light case (4) to the stair panel. (d) Install the tiedown straps (5) that attach the cable. (e) Make the electrical connection (1). (f) To install the stair lights with lens removable, do this step: 1 Apply sealant around the lens (3) (SRM 51-20-01). (g) To install the stair lights with lens fixed, do this step: 1 Apply sealant around the stair light case (4) (SRM 51-20-01). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install access panel 811GW or 811HW ( AMM MPP 06-45-00/100), as applicable. (2) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from these circuit breakers and close them. (a) On the circuit breaker panel: – Courtesy Light 1 (Location tip: HOT BUS 2/COURTESY LIGHT 1); – Courtesy 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/LIGHTS/COURTESY 2). (b) On the left power control and distribution box: • Courtesy 3 (Location tip: RB SERV BUS/COURTESY 3). (3) Do the courtesy/stair light operational test ( AMM TASK 33-26-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-26-03 Page 6 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-03-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH REMOVABLE STAIR LIGHT LENS 4. MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT LENS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the main-door stair light lens. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Main door C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Open these circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them: (a) On the circuit breaker panel: – Courtesy Light 1 (Location tip: HOT BUS 2/COURTESY LIGHT 1). – Courtesy 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/LIGHTS/COURTESY 2). (b) On the left power control and distribution box: • Courtesy 3 (Location tip: RB SERV BUS/COURTESY 3). I. Removal (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Do these items to remove the stair light lens: (a) Remove the sealant from around the lens (2). (b) Remove the two screws (1) which attach the lens (2) to the stair light case. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-26-03 Page 7 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (c) Remove the lens (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-26-03 Page 8 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIR DOOR AND REMOVABLE STAIR LIGHT LENS Main-door Stair Light Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 402 B A ZONE 811 C DET. A DET. B 1. SCREWS (2) 2. LENS DET. C 145AMM330491.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-26-03 Page 9 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-26-03-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH REMOVABLE STAIR LIGHT LENS 5. MAIN-DOOR STAIR LIGHT LENS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the main-door stair light lens. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-26-00-700-801-A/500 COURTESY/STAIR LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 811 Main door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) Specification TT-S-00230 TYPE II Sealant RTV 780 (white) AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Installation (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Do these items to install the stair light lens: (a) Put the lens (2) in its installation position. (b) Tighten the two screw (1) that attach the lens to the stair light case. (c) Apply sealant around the lens (2) (SRM 51-20-01). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-26-03 Page 10 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from these circuit breakers and close them. (a) On the circuit breaker panel: – Courtesy Light 1 (Location tip: HOT BUS 2/COURTESY LIGHT 1); – Courtesy 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/LIGHTS/COURTESY 2). (b) On the left power control and distribution box: • Courtesy 3 (Location tip: RB SERV BUS/COURTESY 3). (2) Do the courtesy/stair light operational test ( AMM TASK 33-26-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-26-03 Page 11 of 11 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
